role.descr: causer of federation,and/or first entity uniting
other entities united with, if separate mention

example.name: With resulting federation
example.text: The republics federated into the Soviet Union.

example.name: More arguments
example.text: Queen Mary federated the Republic of John and the Republic of Jack into the Union of Maryland.

frameset.note: Frame file for 'federate' based on expansion via VerbNet. VN class45.4. Comparison with 'unite'.
